
        [console_scripts]
        wex = wex.command:main

        [pytest11]
        wex = wex.pytestplugin

        [wex.method.http]
        get = wex.http:request
        post = wex.http:request
        phantomjs = wex.phantomjs:request_using_phantomjs

        [wex.method.https]
        get = wex.http:request
        post = wex.http:request
        phantomjs = wex.phantomjs:request_using_phantomjs

        [wex.method.ftp]
        get = wex.ftp:get
